name: Nocturne's Curtain Call
description: A jade pearl shrouded in the light of the moon. Even in the coldest winter night, its gentle warmth lingers like a song.
bonus: Max HP increases by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18%. When triggering Lunar reactions or inflicting Lunar Reaction DMG on opponents, the equipping character will recover 14/15/16/17/18 Energy, and receive the Bountiful Sea's Sacred Wine effect for 12s: Max HP increases by an additional 14%/16%/18%/20%/22%, CRIT DMG from Lunar Reaction DMG increases by 60%/80%/100%/120%/140%. The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.
